title: Magnetic circle with strong non-verbal hypnosis (2) / Dr. Paret's Masterclass
description:
This is the second part of this video, the previous one, you can watch here: https://youtu.be/D9u14AB6y-c After Dr. Paret's students did a Magnetic circle exercise on his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass, the subjects entered in a deep hypnotic induction states. During the Magnetic circle, the hypnotists are many people, so the energy flow is stronger. The subject in the center of this Magnetism tend to dive in deep hypnotic experiences that liberate them. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
